name: com.heathenengineering.steamworks
description: Steamworks.NET with Heathen Engineering's Steamworks Foundation extensions. Steamworks.NET is authored by Riley Labrecque (https://github.com/rlabrecque) and provided on the MIT license (see the license.txt included in the package). Steamworks.NET provides a C# wrapper around the Steamworks SDK. Heathen Engineering's Steamworks Foundation is a set of Unity editor extensions, componenets and behaviours which expand on the Steam API making it more Unity friendly. Heathen's Steamworks Foundation is a free open source lite version of Heathen Engineering's Steamworks Complete which is available on the Unity Asset Store (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/integration/steamworks-v2-complete-190316)
